citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 on
16-Jul-19.
The licensee was not available to come home from work at the time of the attempted inspection. No other facility
representative was available.
